clinical_study.brief_title: Orelabrutinib Plus Rituximab Followed by Maintenance With Orelabrutinib for Relapsed and Refractory Follicular Lymphoma(RR FL)
clinical_study.official_title: Orelabrutinib Plus Rituximab Followed by Maintenance With Orelabrutinib for Relapsed and Refractory Follicular Lymphoma(RR FL) ï¼ša Single Arm, Open Label, Multi-center Phase II Study

brief_summary.textblock: This phase 2 trial studies the efficacy and safety of orelabrutinib plus rituximab followed by maintenance with orelabrutinib for relapsed and refractory follicular lymphoma(RR FL)

primary_outcome.description: Objective Response rate will be determined on the basis of investigator assessments according to 2014 Lugano criteria.

secondary_outcome.description: Complete remission rate will be determined on the basis of investigator
The time from the start of treatment to the progression of the tumor or death (due to any cause).
The time from the start of treatment to time of death (due to any cause).
The time from the first assessment of complete remission or partial remission to progressive disease or death (due to any cause).

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Adverse Events
secondary_outcome.description: Adverse Events will be determined and graded on the basis of investigator assessments according to NCI CTC AE 5.0

arm_group.arm_group_label: Orelabrutinib plus Rituximab followed by Maintenance with Orelabrutinib
arm_group.description: Induction therapy: Patients receive Orelabrutinib at a dose of 25 mg once daily on days 1-28 and rituximab at a dose of 375mg/m2 on day 1. Treatment cycles repeat every 28 days for up to 6 cycles in the absence of disease progression or unacceptable toxicity. If patients achieve CR or PR or SD, they will be treated with maintenance therapy Maintenance therapy: Patients receive Orelabrutinib every day at a dose of 150mg for up to two years in the absence of disease progression or unacceptable toxicity.

intervention.description: Orelabrutinib 150mg po qd d1-28; Rituximab 375mg/m2 iv.drip d1.
intervention.arm_group_label: Orelabrutinib plus Rituximab followed by Maintenance with Orelabrutinib
Orelabrutinib plus Rituximab followed by Maintenance with Orelabrutinib
